description: This file defines a React component called AppShell that provides a layout with a sidebar and header for authenticated routes in a web application. It includes JSX markup for rendering navigation links, user info, and main content area, along with a helper SidebarLink component.

methods.name: AppShell
methods.description: React component rendering the main application layout with sidebar and header, managing user info and children content.

methods.name: SidebarLink
methods.description: A React component rendering a navigation link with styling based on active state.
